name: Penions (Hamstar games)
description:
Penions is a game where you need to work together to make progress. Penions are minions that will follow you everywhere when you click somewhere on the screen. You can sacrifice them by picking them up and toss them away to a certain point and 

they will EXPLODE!

Select a penion 1 by 1 by pressing 1,2 or 3 on the keyboard and press 5 to select them all. 

Also i worked together in this project with Kaiman for the lovely sounddesign

https://ratlab-games.itch.io/
